queries: create table questionnaires (q_id serial primary key, q_name varchar(50) not \null, creation_time date not \null)
create table authors ( author_id serial primary key, author_email varchar(50) not \null)
create table authorisedusers( q_id int not \null, author_id int not \null, foreign key (q_id) references questionnaires(q_id), foreign key (author_id) references authors(author_id))
